scenes.story_text: Once upon a time, there was a beautiful garden full of colorful BUTTERFLIES. They flew gracefully from flower to flower, their wings shimmering in the sunlight.

scenes.story_text: As the BUTTERFLIES flew around the garden, they stumbled upon a puddle. They gathered around it, drinking water and playing with each other, [laughs] enjoying their time together.

scenes.story_text: As a little girl sat in the garden, a BUTTERFLY landed on her hand, tickling her with its delicate wings. She was thrilled to have made a new friend!
